Uses of Class
BookLibrary.Book

    • Uses of Book in BookLibrary

      Fields in BookLibrary declared as Book 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Book[] Library.books 
      Methods in BookLibrary with parameters of type Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Library.add(Book book)
      Adds the book to the array of books Before adding, the growArraySize method is called to check if there is space in the array.
      boolean Library.checkOut(Book book)
      Checks out the book from the library The find method is called to check if the book exists in the library.
      private int Library.find(Book book)
      Helper method to find a book in the bag Checks if the serial number of the book entered is equal to the serial number of any of the books already present in the array through the means of a for loop
      boolean Library.remove(Book book)
      Removes the book from the array of books The find method is called to check exists in the library (What if the book has been checked out?), If the book is found, the shiftArray method is called to get rid of the book
      boolean Library.returns(Book book)
      Returns the book to the library The find method is called to check if the book exists in the library.
      void Library.shiftArray(Book[] books, int index)
      Helper method to move the elements of the array one index down to remove the book from the array The book at the index needs to be removed.
      void Library.sortArrayByNumber(Book[] books)
      This method sorts the array by serial number
